details.description:
Massive 3 bed 2.5 bath top floor duplex in Bushwick ? top 2 floors of a townhouse
Located at Gates and Wilson ? near the Myrtle Wyckoff L/M and so many great bars, restaurants
**Top floor ? 3 king sized bedrooms and 2 full bath Each bedroom easily fits a queen sized bed + desk + more and has lots of closet space and tons of natural light
**Lower floor ? big living room with huge windows and gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel appliances plus a half bath
This is a real unicorn in a world of tiny apartments ? please inquire and have a look!

amenities.other: Abundance of natural light, Closet in every bedroom, Hardwood Floors, Full-size refrigerator, Full-size oven

details.description:
Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
"Each living space serves as your cozy urban sanctuary. With a minimalist, modern style, featuring sleek white counters with an abundance of storage and state of the art stainless steel appliances, these units make a night at home a retreat from the fast pace of the city. Wall to wall white oak floors are laid throughout your home, and floor to ceiling windows offer stunning views. As you relax at home, enjoy the luxury of listening to your favorite music through built-in bluetooth speakers. Each suite also offers the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer, so you can go enjoy a beverage on your private terrace while you're waiting for your clothes to dry.Wake up every morning to a beautiful sunrise pouring over Downtown Brooklyn, high above the hustle and bustle of the city. After a long day at work, wind down with a cocktail on your spacious balcony as the day fades over the horizon. Feeling social? Take a trip up to the rooftop terrace where you'll find spectacular views of the Statue of Liberty, Brooklyn Promenade, Barclay?s Center, Downtown Brooklyn, Manhattan and Williamsburg Bridges, and the Manhattan skyline. No matter the time of day, these views will never fail to impress or inspire.Nestled in the heart of Downtown Brooklyn, The Azure is steps away from everything the area has to offer. Across the street from Alamo Draft House, Trader Joe's and DeKalb Market Hall, you don't need to go far from home for the things you need. Walk to catch a concert or a Nets game only minutes away at the world famous Barclay's center. Take a scenic 10-minute bike ride down to Park Slope or a quick stroll over to Brooklyn Bridge Park. If you're feeling adventurous and ready to explore, The Azure is surrounded by multiple subway lines ready to transport you to the best neighborhoods the city has to offer. The Azure offers not just a place to call home but a lifestyle, and as time becomes more limited, convenience is key. Keep your heart rate up by spending time in the ten thousand square foot gym, complete with personal trainers and a discounted tenant membership. After you break a sweat, stop by the package room to pick up your parcels, followed by your delivered groceries waiting for you in the cold storage room. Grab your bike from the bike room and head over to Devocion coffee shop for some of the best coffee in the world. While there's plenty to do around the Azure, you also have the opportunity to converse with your neighbors on the outdoor terrace or in the 3rd-floor tenant?s lounge, where you can find a wet bar, game room, and business center. Afterwards, you can catch a movie in The Azure?s state-of-the-art outdoor amphitheater"
6:26 Building 436 Albee Square is Downtown Brooklyn?s newest luxury apartment building. Designed by Eran Chen's increasingly prolific ODA Architecture, this blue glass tower rises high above the downtown's ever expanding skyline. Once inside you are greeted by vaulted ceilings and striking green mosaic tiling throughout the elevator attended lobby. At 28 stories tall, the building boasts 150 beautifully appointed apartments starting on the 3rd floor sitting over two floors of bustling retail. Apartment layouts range from Studios to 3 bedrooms, each with unique outdoor spaces. Travel further to the roof and find 360-degree views of downtown Manhattan, Brooklyn, the West Harbor and Statue of Liberty.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C, Balcony/Terrace, Washer/Dryer In Unit

Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen, separate living room with natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, and renovated bathroom.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security Heat & hot water included NO BROKER FEE

Come be a part of this historic and fantastic neighborhood.

The building also features a laundry room, a private parking lot and garage, bike storage, fios internet, and two amazing roof decks. Surrounded by convenient neighborhood amenities, galleries, restaurants, coffee shops and bars. All just 15 minutes to downtown Manhattan via the J Express train.

Everything you?ve been looking for in Bushwick is right here! Massive living room with a window bringing in natural light. Cross the street and sip your morning coffee at Maria Hernandez park. Enjoy the multitude of neighborhood cafes and bars. No need to worry about commute times, the Jefferson L train stop is just two blocks from your door. All this and pet-friendly too!

Brand new 2.5 room / 1 bath with central air! Tons of light and high ceilings in this unit. Just one block from Myrtle/Wyckoff L/M stop! Laundry in the basement, LATCH smartlocks on all doors in the building!
This has been used as a 3br in the past but owners have dropped the price and advertising as a 2br. The 3br room has french doors that open to the living room area.
Please call or text to take a look today!

Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment nestled in the heart of Bushwick. The unit features an open stainless steel kitchen with a plenty of storage along with a spacious living area perfect for entertaining. Huge shared courtyard for the building with bike storage and plenty of room for bringing friends over for summer time BBQ hang. Lots of closet space! Also for those that can?t live without their furry friends, the building allows pets. Located just a couple blocks from the M and L trains with choice spots for shopping, brunch and a night out all close by.
No Fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

This fully renovated 3 BR is classic Brooklyn with exposed brick and oak hardwood floors, Sun splashed with lots of windows and a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Bedrooms are bright with closet space. Crown Heights is a lively diverse neighborhood with easy access to unlimited choices for food, entertainment and cultural events. It's a short enjoyable walk to the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and the Botanic Gardens. Great local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's surround you. It's easy to access most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal for an easy commute to Manhattan & the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Contact us to schedule your appointment today!

details.description:
Introducing 312 Broadway, Brooklyn?s finest boutique rental development consisting of sleek and spacious studio, one- and two-bedroom residences with generous layouts, striking interiors and exceptional amenities amongst Williamsburg?s sophisticated and flourishing south side. Surrounded by a diverse array of parks, shops, restaurants and nightlife, 312 Broadway offers the unparalleled urban lifestyle package in the heart of the borough?s best neighborhood. Unit 5B is an Industrial chic living space, and an expansive private outdoor terrace. One of the most coveted units in the building, this Southwest facing unit, features white oak hardwood floors, 11? exposed concrete ceilings, electric vented washer/dryers and imported triple-paned tilt-and-turn sound engineered windows for abundant natural light and whisper-quiet tranquility. Contemporary kitchens, designed with practicality and beauty in mind, offer GE stainless steel appliances and dramatic drip pendant lighting, while black Caesarstone countertops set against white melamine cabinetry adds an element of striking ambience. Outfitted with polished chrome fixtures and full white subway tiled walls, soothing monochrome bathrooms include [deep soaking tubs], [rainfall steam showers] and custom mirrored vanities with plenty of storage space.
Experience the best of modern boutique living with the impressive set of amenities offered, including a virtual doorman, elevator, individual bicycle storage, *private onsite parking with electrical charging ports and landscaped common roof deck with spectacular views of the Manhattan skyline and magnificent Williamsburg Bridge. The J, M Z trains, located seconds away from your front door, offer a swift and easy commute into Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Terrace

details.description:
Welcome to the brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views of both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Explore the numerous nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more! Treat yourself to the delightful offerings of local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee, and for those late-night cravings, you'll find beloved spots like Shake Shack just a few blocks away. This residence combines the classic essence of old-school Brooklyn with the allure of modern luxury living, making it the perfect place to call home.
Convenience is key, as the building is situated near the A, C, and F train lines, as well as the B57, B62, and B69 bus routes.
Unit features include:
Hardwood floors Stainless steel kitchen appliances Dishwasher and microwave Central air conditioning and heating Private balconies (inquire for availability) In-unit laundry (inquire for availability) Building amenities encompass:
Courtyard Roof deck Elevator Laundry room Fitness center Recreation room Tenant lounge Package room Bike storage Pet-friendly accommodations To secure your new home, all you need is the first month's rent and a security deposit. Best of all, there is no broker fee involved!
Experience the epitome of luxury living in a prime location. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity!

details.description:
Welcome to 2 Stanwix 2R/2A in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix 2R/2A is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.
